kw.name: Open API

test.doc: Validate get all data to API and get response 200. The following steps are executed: - Open the API page - Call list-layers endpoint - Verify if response is True - Call list-regions endpoint - Verify if response is True - Call list-supported-formats endpoint - Verify if response is True - Call list-regions endpoint - Verify if response is True - Call add-parameter endpoint - Verify if response is True - Call retrieve-image endpoint - Verify if response is True - Call list-available-times endpoint - Verify if response is True
test.status:
Setup failed: Evaluating expression 'sys.modules['selenium.webdriver'].ChromeOptions()' failed: ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'selenium'
Also teardown failed: No keyword with name 'Close Browser' found.

suite.doc: This test verifies that all the API functions retrieve a 200 response
